title: FEMALE PLAYERS! ARE YOU THERE??????
body:
I have not found another girl on this server :(
I would really love to have an all girl ranked team that don't suck like The Sirens.
Keep in mind ive been demoted from silver to B5 so I'm not one to talk but Ive been pwning lately.
Not to be sexist because i have played with some great players ALL DUDES.
But would love to know that I'm not the only girl on OCE.
If you are of the female species or know one who loves league and is actually skilled please post on this discussion.

:)

replies.body: Damn this is some toxic discussion haha. If you want to find some new players to talk to and play with (guys & girls) check out a facebook group like QLD League of Legends
Wow never knew that group existed. Thanks dude/ dudette
my sister plays lol. and shes gold
Cool! I'd love to see her play. Have you go a user name for her?
I have a friend names smurfie007, she's pretty nice

[Why post twice?](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/kVomUdrP-female-players)

And gender really shouldn't matter, all that matters is whether you enjoy the game or not don't you agree?
Its not so much that it matters, I just think the behavior of alot of males is impacting my performance and enjoyment lately.

Maybe the bad mouthers are in fact girls, you will never know.

So idk, don't stereotype too much. It isn't good you know.
That is a really good point, at the end of the day we are all just people when it comes to being online because there is no actual way of knowing WHO is WHO and WHAT.

I posted twice because I was not sure which board best suited my topic of discussion.
There's no issue and I am totally unaware of what might have given you that impression. I was just curious and to be perfectly honest I am finding a lot of the behavior and language offensive and preventing me from enjoying the game. Not ALL but many of the male users are either cruel and disrespectful or sleazy :( I actually avoid the whole "I'm a girl"routine in actual games because I instantly become a target.  I am not seeking special treatment or attention based on my gender. Simply curious as to whether or not playing with other girls might improve my performance.
OCE compared to any other server has definitely got the highest amount of bullying and I'm kinda fed up with it.

Do guys ever said "hey I am a guy" in the game chat? I guess not.

So when you say "hey I am a girl" you become a target not due to your gender sadly, it's the impression that it gives people. People will think you're an attention XXX.

Much like how everybody was in a team doing something and someone suddenly said "hey guys no know what, I am pretty good at math btw". Ofc people would instantly go "u wot?"

I am pretty sure there are plenty of girls in our community, just like guys, and I am also pretty sure that most of us are actually more interested in the game instead of what gender the teammate or enemy team has.

Sorry to break it to you, but bullying is rampant on all servers. Every server says their server has the highest amount of toxic players for X or Y reason.

I consider myself a feminist. I've never gone out and said "I'm a girl" or "I'm a boy." Which one am I? I won't say, because it's irrelevant to this discussion. That's the brilliance of games like LoL. Everybody's equal until proven otherwise. In game, I will treat everyone with respect as a fellow competitor in the game.

Now, if someone goes out of their way to say "I'm a girl" in a game, I will GO OUT OF MY WAY to be toxic to them. I've never been warned, never been banned, and I'm not a toxic person in general. Why, then, am I toxic in this situation? 

Because if you have the sort of mentality to say "hey guys I'm a girl," you're basically saying "I'm a special snowflake and I deserve more attention because I have a vagina." It's the EXACT opposite of feminism. So if you want to be anti-feminist, I'll go ahead and be anti-female (towards you) too.

Now, I didn't mean to be rude, but I hope you understand why people treat you that way now. This view is common on the internet. You only have to look at other places e.g. 4chan where they say "titz or gtfo" to people who say "I'm a grill" to see the same concept in action.

I am grill.

Best Sluzza Oce.
